alert.note: Alert for Garland; Grant; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 10:42PM CDT until June 25 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Grant County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Garland County in central Arkansas... Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1042 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rockport, or near Malvern, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Village... Malvern... Mountain Pine... Rockport... Prattsville... Poyen... Perla... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Lake Ouachita State Park... Thiel... Hot Springs National Park... Rockwell... Donaldson... Magnet Cove... Lono... Oaklawn Racetrack... Gifford... Glen Rose... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
